title: Greatest magnitude of electric field using diagram

content.prompt: A small charged bead held inside the electric field has an electric force exerted upon it. At which location does the electric force have a greater magnitude?

choices.label: Neither; the magnitude of the force is the same at both locations.
It cannot be determined without knowing the sign of the charge on the bead.

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
